chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
We are on May 22, 2024, the order should have been sent yesterday, however, even though it's today's estimated delivery day, the order hasn't even been shipped yet.
Thanks,

Hello,

We wanted to let you know Sara hasn’t received their order.

We’ve checked the tracking link, but there isn’t an update.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

If you've shipped the order, but it's lost, we will gather the paperwork from the customer and forward it to you. We'll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Daniel, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number 1ZBF1560D901112266. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.ups.com/track?loc=es_es&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901112266/trackdetails

Regards,
JY
